feed.title: Nextcloud Talk Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v19.0.15
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(calls): Do not reset previous connected users after resuming in a call #14735
  • fix(sidebar): Show tooltips when Talk is in the sidebar #14697
  • fix(guests): Fix style and labels on public share page as a guest #14720 #14726
  • fix(calls): Skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call #14787
  • fix(calls): Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting #14788

What's Changed

* [stable29] fix(l10n): Fix translation source strings by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14641 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.125 to 7.0.126 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14659 * [stable29] fix: show tooltips in sidebar (from Vue directive) by @Antreesy in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14697 * [stable29] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14709 * [stable29] style: drop redundant overrides for public shares by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14726 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.126 to 7.0.127 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14740 * [stable29] fix: public share style and guest actions fixes by @Antreesy in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14720 * [stable29] fix: Do not reset previous users after a resume by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14735 * [stable29] fix(RoomController): skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14787 * [stable29] Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14788 * chore(release): Prepare 19.0.15 by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14784

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v19.0.14...v19.0.15

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v20.1.6
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix: Improve performance of conversation list #14810 #14830 #14834
  • fix: Improve performance when rendering system messages #14816
  • fix(guests): Allow guests to reload the page without re-entering the password #14785
  • fix(federation): Fix calls when federated server receive messages in wrong order #14769
  • fix(calls): Fix call after resuming connection #14736
  • fix(calls): Fix wrongly showing "Missed call" in one-to-one conversations #14832
  • fix(workflows): Adjust workflow registration to new mechanism #14823
  • fix(polls): Hide intermediate results from anonymous polls #14723

What's Changed

* [stable30] fix(l10n): Fix translation source strings by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14639 * build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/core from 7.26.9 to 7.26.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14657 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.21 to 9.2.22 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14656 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.125 to 7.0.126 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14658 * [stable30] fix(call): revert hard-fix within conversation navigation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14647 * [stable30] fix(i18n): minor string fixes by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14719 * [stable30] fix(PollViewer): hide intermediate results from anonymous polls by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14723 * [stable30] style: drop redundant overrides for public shares by @Antreesy in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14721 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.22 to 9.2.23 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14749 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.126 to 7.0.127 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14750 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14756 * [stable30] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14758 * [stable30] fix: Do not reset previous users after a resume by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14736 * [stable30] fix(federation): Heal request order for slow federation connections by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14769 * [stable30] fix(RoomController): skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14785 * [stable30] ci: Fix guests app branch by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14793 * [stable30] Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14789 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14805 * [stable30] fix(chat): Fix preloading the last chat message with the room query by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14810 * [stable30] fix(LeftSidebar): conversation subline hardening by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14818 * [stable30] fix(Flow): adapt to registration fixes at workflowengine by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14823 * [stable30] fix(chat): Fix end-of-call showing "missed call" sometimes in one-to-one by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14832 * [stable30] feat(conversations): Allow to not request the last message when getting rooms by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14834 * [stable30] fix(chat): Don't look for some more hardcoded guests by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14816 * [stable30] fix(performance): Improve performance with many file shares as last mâ€¦ by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14830 * [stable30] Release 20.1.6 by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14841

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v20.1.5...v20.1.6

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.0.2
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix: Improve performance of conversation list #14811 #14779 #14777 #14775 #14774 #14831
  • fix: Improve performance when rendering system messages #14817
  • fix: Improve performance when searching for conversations #14734
  • fix(chat): Fix missing reactions on own messages while posting #14695
  • fix(guests): Allow guests to reload the page without re-entering the password #14786
  • fix(federation): Fix calls when federated server receive messages in wrong order #14770
  • fix(calls): Fix call after resuming connection #14737
  • fix(calls): Fix wrongly showing "Missed call" in one-to-one conversations #14833
  • fix(calls): Fix videos in the last row being cut off #14692
  • fix(calls): Prevent screen from turning off during calls #14733
  • fix(settings): Fix initial state of end-to-end-encrypted calls setting #14693
  • fix(events): Automatically confirm the calendar event for the organizer #14762
  • fix(workflows): Adjust workflow registration to new mechanism #14823
  • fix(polls): Hide intermediate results from anonymous polls #14724

What's Changed

* [stable31] fix(l10n): Fix translation source strings by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14640 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.125 to 7.0.126 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14660 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.21 to 9.2.22 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14663 * build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/core from 7.26.9 to 7.26.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14662 * build(deps): Bump ua-parser-js from 2.0.2 to 2.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14661 * [stable31] fix(call): revert hard-fix within conversation navigation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14648 * [stable31] fix: update @nextcloud/vue file imports by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14674 * [stable31] fix: migrate from deprecated OC.dialogs.confirmDestructive by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14691 * [stable31] fix(Grid): fix cropped videos in the last row by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14692 * [stable31] fix(AdminSettings): respect initial state of E2EE setting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14693 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14708 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14710 * [stable31] fix(PollViewer): hide intermediate results from anonymous polls by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14724 * [stable31] fix(messages): fix missing instant reactions for own message by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14695 * [stable31] feat: reduce items rendering in left sidebar search results by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14734 * [stable31] fix(call): prevent screen from turning off during call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14733 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.126 to 7.0.127 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14752 * build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/cdav-library from 1.5.2 to 1.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14751 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.22 to 9.2.23 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14753 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14755 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14759 * [stable31] fix(calls): Fix system message for unanswered call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14761 * [stable31] fix: do not add organizer as attendee and set status by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14762 * [stable31] fix: Do not reset previous users after a resume by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14737 * [stable31] fix(a11y): provide missing aria-labels to buttons with no visible text by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14768 * [stable31] fix(federation): Heal request order for slow federation connections by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14770 * [stable31] fix(performance): Parse file shares inaccurately to prevent setupFS by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14774 * [stable31] feat(conversations): Allow to not request the last message when getting rooms by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14775 * [stable31] fix(shares): Fix lightweight share condition for CardDAV files by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14777 * [stable31] feat(conversations): do not request last message when in compact mode by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14779 * [stable31] fix: improve string handling by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14764 * [stable31] chore(deps): bump nextcloud/vue from 8.23.1 to 8.24.0 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14781 * [stable31] fix(RoomController): skip password verification for guests that are reconnecting to the call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14786 * [stable31] ci: Fix guests app branch by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14792 * [stable31] Fix leaving call if a signaling message is received while reconnecting by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14790 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14804 * [stable31] fix(chat): Fix preloading the last chat message with the room query by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14811 * [stable31] fix(LeftSidebar): conversation subline hardening by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14819 * [stable31] fix(chat): Don't look for some more hardcoded guests by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14817 * [stable31] fix(Flow): adapt to registration fixes at workflowengine by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14824 * [stable31] fix(performance): Improve performance with many file shares as last mâ€¦ by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14831 * [stable31] fix(chat): Fix end-of-call showing "missed call" sometimes in one-to-one by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14833 * [stable31] ci: Generate authoritative classmap again by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14843 * [stable31] Release 21.0.2 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14840

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.0.1...v21.0.2

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.0.3
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(avatar): Fix regression from library requesting too many status updates #14894
  • fix(chat): Improve regex of todo-list handling also uppercase X #14904
  • fix(federation): Use correct capability to show call-notification setting in federated conversations #14907

What's Changed

* [stable31] feat(one-to-one): Don't invite one-to-one participant before sending â€¦ by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14849 * [stable31] test: Fix broken scenario by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14854 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14864 * [stable31] chore: Update coding standard in behat by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14863 * [stable31.0] chore(deps): bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.24.0 to 8.25.1 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14894 * [stable31.0] fix(outOfOffice): show expand button during call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14900 * [stable31.0] fix(message): improve regexp for interactive todo items by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14904 * [stable31.0] fix(federation): respect remote capabilities when show "Notify about calls" by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14907 * [stable31.0] chore(release): Add changelog for 21.0.3 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14911

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.0.2...v21.0.3

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.0.4
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(schedule-meeting): Make sure the other user is in one-to-one when scheduling #14973 #14967
  • fix(schedule-meeting): Improve dialog when scheduling in one-to-one #14923
  • fix(schedule-meeting): Hide schedule meeting from former one-to-one #14923
  • fix(performance): Fix unnecessary user_status requests from avatar component #14932

What's Changed

* [stable31.0] fix: do not make extra requests to user_status by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14932 * [stable31.0] chore(deps): bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.25.1 to 8.26.0 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14942 * [stable31.0] fix(CalendarEventsDialog): adjust UI based on conversation type by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14923 * [stable31.0] fix: show schedule meeting invite option for fresh 1-1 conversations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14973 * [stable31.0] fix(scheduling): Enforce one-to-one participants before scheduling by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14967 * [stable31.0] chore(release): Changelog for 21.0.4 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14977

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.0.3...v21.0.4
